text: Franco Sar (21 December 1933 – 1 October 2018) was an Italian decathlete.Franco Sar . sports-reference.com He was born in Arborea, Italy. He held the national title from 1960–65. He competed at the 1960 and 1964 Summer Olympics and placed sixth and thirteenth. Sar died of a heart attack on 1 October 2018 at the age of 84.Atletica in Lutto, è morto Franco Sar, Olimpico e Padre della SNIA ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Decathletes Category:Olympians for Italy
title: Franco Sar
